results.name: Primes of the form (k! + 3)/3.
comment: The next term is too large to include.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..13
program: (MAGMA) [a: n in [1..50] | IsPrime(a) where a is (Factorial(n)+3) div 3]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 12 2011
results.author: _Cino Hilliard_, Dec 05 2003
